channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Theme Editor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Theme Editor

item.title: CVE-2021-24154|2024-08-03T19:21:18.397Z -- unknown -- theme%20editor
item.description: The Theme Editor WordPress plugin before 2.6 did not validate the GET file parameter before passing it to the download_file() function, allowing administrators to download arbitrary files on the web server, such as /etc/passwd
